review: "Z.H.P. Unlosing Ranger vs. Darkdeath Evilman is a fantastic addition to the SRPG genre, especially for fans of the Disgaea series. The game's deep customization options for creating your own superhero and secret base add a unique and engaging layer to the gameplay. The randomly generated battle maps ensure high replay value, which I appreciate. However, the grind can be a bit tedious, and the permadeath system can be frustrating at times. Despite these minor issues, the game offers a lot of content and humor, making it a worthwhile purchase for dedicated gamers."
